name: stimulus-sheet
description: Stimulus Sheet component - slide-in panels from the right

scripts.package: npm run build && npm pack && mkdir -p releases && mv stimulus-sheet-*.tgz releases/ && npm run package:zip
scripts.package:zip: mkdir -p releases/stimulus-sheet-temp && cp -r dist docs README.md MIGRATION.md BRANCHES.md SECURITY.md package.json releases/stimulus-sheet-temp/ && cd releases && zip -r stimulus-sheet-$(node -p "require('../package.json').version").zip stimulus-sheet-temp && rm -rf stimulus-sheet-temp

author: Gilles Gauthier
